description: Initial golden benchmark dataset for Flowbaby retrieval evaluation (v0.7.4 baseline). Contains 12 representative queries covering required risk slices per Plan 112.

slice_definitions.template-heavy: Cases where structure dominates content (templates, placeholders, boilerplate)
slice_definitions.edge-sparse: Cases with minimal/no relationships in the knowledge graph (metadata-only)
slice_definitions.technical: Technical content (stack traces, error messages, code, paths)
slice_definitions.chat-shaped: Short Q/A inputs typical of chat-centric ontology
slice_definitions.relationship-heavy: Queries requiring relationship traversal in the KG
slice_definitions.no-context: True negative queries - no relevant context should exist
slice_definitions.multi-hop: Compound queries requiring multiple reasoning steps

notes: Qrels are human-reviewed and stable. Multi-positive handling uses filtered-style (any labeled positive counts as relevant).
